thread.title: Cohera closes first tranche of $50mm Series E round
thread.title_full: Cohera closes first tranche of $50mm Series E round

title: Cohera closes first tranche of $50mm Series E round
text:
Cohera closes first tranche of $50mm Series E round Deal Date: Oct-01-2015 / Deal # 201530774 Executive Summary 
Cohera Medical Inc. (absorbable surgical sealants and adhesives) closed the first tranche of a $50mm round, which appears to be the company's Series E. (Its Series D closed in January 2014.) KKR (Kohlberg Kravis Roberts) led and takes a board seat, and was joined by returning private buyers. Proceeds will fund the launch of the TissuGlu internal surgical adhesive, and will also support trials of the bowel repair sealant Sylys . Within the last year, TissuGlu gained FDA approval and Sylys was CE-marked.
